venue.name: New Britain Museum Of American Art

item.description: Enjoy the evening with other singles and listen to live jazz music. Come early and meet us just inside entrance door between 5:30-6:00 pm. Door admission $10 includes light hors dâ€™oeuvres; wine or beer $3. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 56 Lexington Street: I-84 to 72E or Rt. 9 to 72W, Exit 7 Corbin Avenue, take Rt. 372W to 1st light, turn right onto West Main Street, after 3rd light turn right onto Lexington Street, facility on left.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be just inside entrance door between 5:30 - 6 pm with sign.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
